title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects, I encounter a message that I don't understand.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy (e.g., org.apache.ant), I receive the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
EB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy (e.g., org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. However, I receive the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.'
SR: 1. Open a binary project in the tool. 2. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy (e.g., org.apache.ant).
